model.tasks

Class BuildStructureTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.tasks.Task
      • model.tasks.BuildStructureTask

  • public class BuildStructureTask
extends Task
    Builds a structure at a specified location
    Author:
    Christopher Chapline, James Fagan, Emily Leones, Michelle Yung

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BuildStructureTask(int work, int locWorker, int locTask, Map map, AbstractStructure structure)
      Creates a task that results in a structure being added to the map

    • Constructor Detail

      • BuildStructureTask

        public BuildStructureTask(int work,
                  int locWorker,
                  int locTask,
                  Map map,
                  AbstractStructure structure)
        Creates a task that results in a structure being added to the map
        Parameters:
        work - The amount of work required to complete this task (number of game ticks)
        locWorker - The location the worker working on this task will be
        locTask - The location that the task will be located at
        map - The map that this task takes place on
        structure - The structure being built during this task

    • Method Detail

      • performAction

        public void performAction()
        Performs the action for the call

        Adds the structure to the map and to the civilization

        Specified by:
        performAction in class Task
